content:
```
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position(-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5) that puts into transport belt
- Transport belt at position (-18.5, -49.5) that connects the drill to the inserter

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when placing entities and being too far
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity. The maximum placement distance is 10.
### Errors when placing a burner mining drill
- Cannot place burner-mining-drill at the target location if something is in the way or part of the terrain is unplaceable (water).

# NAMESPACE
```
